holidays.title: National Thank a Mail Carrier Day
World Cancer Day
holidays.description: An important day to raise awareness about prevention, detection, and treatment of this fatal disease.

holidays.title: Angola Liberation Day
holidays.description: Angola Liberation Day is the day when Angolans fought tenaciously against colonial rule.

holidays.title: British Yorkshire Pudding Day
holidays.description: This baked pudding is honored for its centuries-long stalwart place in the British food lexicon.

holidays.title: Create a Vacuum Day
holidays.description: It’s time to awaken the lab nerd in you and tinker around with vacuums.

holidays.title: Dump Your Significant Jerk Day
holidays.description: This day is observed to help those in a seriously bad relationship get out of it.

holidays.title: Facebook's Birthday
holidays.description: Flood your timeline with wishes for Facebook, the app that keeps you connected.

holidays.title: Farmer's Day
holidays.description: Prepare to harvest the blessings of Lichun and the new year with your farm produce.

holidays.title: International Day of Human Fraternity
holidays.description: Here’s everything you need to know about this day and the events leading up to it.

holidays.title: Liberace Day
holidays.description: Join us in celebrating this music maverick and pop culture icon today.

holidays.title: Medjool Date Day
holidays.description: Did you know Medjool dates have more potassium than bananas?

holidays.title: National Day of Sri Lanka
holidays.description: Celebrate Sri Lanka’s Independence from Great Britain and the colonization that came with their rule.

holidays.title: National Hemp Day
holidays.description: Hemp has many amazing properties we're sure you did not know about.

holidays.title: National Homemade Soup Day
holidays.description: National Homemade Soup Day is celebrated on February 4. Soup is the perfect winter meal. People have been enjoying this simple yet extremely delicious dish…

holidays.title: National Israel Day
holidays.description: Happy Israel Day to everyone bearing this name as well as the nation itself!

holidays.title: National Stuffed Mushroom Day
holidays.description: Tantalize your taste buds with this delightful delicacy, but don't forget to appreciate its existence too.

holidays.title: National Thank a Mailman Day
holidays.description: Technology may have evolved, but mailmen are still crucial to all of us.

holidays.title: National Wicker Day
holidays.description: Wicker is still as fashionable and eco-friendly as it used to be.

holidays.title: Philippine-American War Memorial Day
holidays.description: On Philippine-American War Memorial Day, let’s remember those who fought valiantly for freedom.

holidays.title: Pork Rind Appreciation Day
holidays.description: You’re in for a swell time with pork rinds and a fun, sporty day!

holidays.title: Quacker Day
holidays.description: Calling out all ‘Quacker’ women! Celebrate your queen and her legacy today.

holidays.title: Scout Sunday
holidays.description: We celebrate the Scout’s oath and law which helps adolescents reach their full potential!

holidays.title: Sweater Day
holidays.description: Sweaters and sustainability. Who knew they could benefit each other so well?

holidays.title: Torture Abolition Day
holidays.description: Today we get to play our part in raising awareness about torture.

holidays.title: USO Day
holidays.description: We have the best suggestions to make your USO Day observance a memorable one.

holidays.title: Willie Mays Day
holidays.description: We honor a baseball legend and celebrate his numerous achievements today.

holidays.title: Alice Cooper’s Birthday
holidays.description: “The hippies wanted peace and love. We wanted Ferraris, blondes, and switchblades.”― Alice Cooper

holidays.title: Rosa Parks’s Birthday
holidays.description: For this amazing civil rights activist, injustice anywhere was a threat to justice everywhere.

holidays.title: Tabitha Brown’s Birthday
holidays.description: She launched a TikTok account in 2020 and has been sharing cooking tips and vegan recipes.
